js.tinyvm.io
Class LEByteWriter

java.lang.Object
  js.tinyvm.io.ByteWriter
      js.tinyvm.io.LEByteWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IByteWriter
public class LEByteWriter
extends ByteWriter

Writes lo-byte first, hi-byte last. In longs, hi-word goes first, but each word is written as though with writeU4.
